attributes.action: not give David Beckham a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Beckham is a pleasant enough man, and a fairly good footballer, but has achieved no more than many other sports men and women.  The 1966 World Cup winning team were only awarded OBEs - to single David out for a knighthood would be an insult to the many other sports men and women of similar or better talent who have not recieved one, and little more than a publicity stunt that would demean the title.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
